classes.name: LatencyTimingConstraint
classes.note: Constrains the time duration between the occurrence of the stimulus and the occurrence of the corresponding response of that scope. In contrast to scope, a causal dependency between the stimulus and the corresponding response of the scope is required.

latency.note: The specific type of this latency constraint.

maximum.note: The maximum latency between the occurrence of the the occurrence of the corresponding the associated event chain.

minimum.note: The minimum latency between the occurrence of the the occurrence of the corresponding the associated event chain.

nominal.note: The nominal latency between the occurrence of the the occurrence of the corresponding the associated event chain.

scope.note: The event chain that defines the scope of the constraint.
